name: Big Brain (elsonng)
description:
Big Brain is a puzzle game made for the Retro Inspired game jam 2019 by James Cook University.

The game starts off with you playing as a brain, with your physical body removed by evil scientists carrying out experiments. However, to make up for the lack of mobility, you have hacking powers which allow you to control the autonomous robots around you. Use that to your advantage to retrieve your human body.

There is no tutorial in the game due to a lack of time but it has been included in the readme.txt with a guide on the controls.
